listSizeCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NzMessageService } from 'ng-zorro-antd'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-list-simple', template: `
Default Size
[ITEM] {{ item }}
Small Size
Large Size
  • edit
` }) export class NzDemoListSimpleComponent { data = [ 'Racing car sprays burning fuel into crowd.', 'Japanese princess to wed commoner.', 'Australian walks 100km after outback crash.', 'Man charged over missing wedding girl.', 'Los Angeles battles huge wildfires.' ]; constructor(public msg: NzMessageService) {} }
listVerticalCode: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-list-vertical', template: ` 156 156 2 {{item.title}} ` }) export class NzDemoListVerticalComponent { data = new Array(5).fill({}).map((i, index) => { return { href: 'http://ant.design', title: `ant design part \${index}`, avatar: 'https://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/ODTLcjxAfvqbxHnVXCYX.png', description: 'Ant Design, a design language for background applications, is refined by Ant UED Team.', content: 'We supply a series of design principles, practical patterns and high quality design resources (Sketch and Axure), to help people create their product prototypes beautifully and efficiently.' }; }); }
